mapper.select: select * from (select t.id, t.title, t.readCounts, t.excerpt, t.author, t.createdAt, t.listPic, t.mdcontent, t.shareCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.category order by t2.category SEPARATOR ',') as category from boke_article t,boke_article_type t2 where t.id = t2.articleId and t.id = #{id} GROUP BY t.id,t.title, t.readCounts, t.excerpt, t.author, t.createdAt, t.listPic, t.mdcontent) t

select * from (select t.id, t.title, t.readCounts, t.excerpt, t.author, t.createdAt, t.listPic, t.mdcontent, t.shareCode, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.category order by t2.category SEPARATOR ',') as category from boke_article t,boke_article_type t2 where t.id = t2.articleId
GROUP BY t.id,t.title, t.readCounts, t.excerpt, t.author, t.createdAt, t.listPic, t.mdcontent) t
